sentence.Network_en: I'm telling you here and now to let this rubbishy idea drop.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对你说,赶紧打消这种荒谬的想法.

sentence.Network_en: The rubbishy newspaper formed almost the sole reading of the majority.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份垃圾报纸几乎成为大多数人唯一阅读的材料.

sentence.Network_en: You know, the kids are exposed to rubbishy commercials and spectacles of violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 你知道, 孩子们面对的是一堆暴力场面和毫无价值的商业广告.

list.abs: I'm telling you here and now to let this rubbishy idea drop .我对你说，赶紧打消这种荒谬的想法。
worse than all , rubbishy commercials and harmful programmes lead to bad tastes and distorted viewpoint towards human life .更糟的是，不良的电视广告和有害的电视节目促成了低级趣味和对人生不正确的看法。

entry.def: If you describe something as rubbishy, you think it is of very poor quality.

means.word_mean: 1. cheap and inferior; of no value;

sentences.sentence: "rubbishy newspapers that form almost the sole reading of the majority"

auth_sentence.content: Why don't you get rid of that rubbishy old furniture.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why don't you get rid of that rubbishy old furniture.

auth_sentence.content: That's a pretty rubbishy argument, you don't ask any other enterprise to pay for all the costs of the education of their staff.
